function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 due to climate conditions","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving building design to mitigate the impact of climate conditions on virus transmission","Technologies":"Building ventilation systems, air purification technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and government regulators"},{"Description":"Dissemination of COVID-19 in built and social environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for social distancing and improved building ventilation","Technologies":"Sensor-based occupancy monitoring, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disregard of climate change by building stakeholders","Impact":"Contributing to greenhouse gas emissions and climate change","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient building practices and sustainable construction materials","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, green building certifications","People":"Building stakeholders and decision-makers","Owner":"Sustainability consultants, environmental organizations"}]}
